Welcome to Global Climate and SDG Engagement I
Global Climate and SDG Engagement I (GCSE I)

is a module of the Technical University Berlin 
with the African member universities and NGOs of the network Greening 
Africa Together. Master students from all partner universities work 
together in groups on service-learning projects to meet the specific 
needs of target populations in energy, waste and resource 
management, water conservation, reforestation, aforestation, food processing, organic agriculture, and CO2 compensation
using sustainable technologies and methods.
